name: ¿Resiliencia? // ¿Resilience?
description:
A heart changed its beat. Confused, scared, distrustful. The life around didn't stop flowing, but the fear of any contact was much greater. 
Lonely, melancholic, angry.
Is it possible to accept such a radical change in such a short time? 
If only that heart knew that good things outweigh any adversity. If only it realized that it doesn't need to fly when it can move forward and shine anyway.
Could this be called adaptation?
// Piece that appears on the book "Memorias a la distancia" in SLP, México.
